title: Loan Eligibility
description: Write a program that determines if a person is eligible for a loan based on their income and credit score. If the income is above $50,000 and the credit score is above 600, the person is eligible for a loan. If the income is below $30,000 or the credit score is below 500, the person is not eligible for a loan. If the income and credit score are between these ranges, the person may be eligible for a loan.
sample_output: May be eligible for a loan
